JobGroups.template:
defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  almalinux-*-boot-iso-x86_64:
    distri: almalinux
    flavor: boot-iso
    version: '*'
  almalinux-*-dvd-iso-x86_64:
    distri: almalinux
    flavor: dvd-iso
    version: '*'
  almalinux-*-minimal-iso-x86_64:
    distri: almalinux
    flavor: minimal-iso
    version: '*'
  almalinux-*-package-set-x86_64:
    distri: almalinux
    flavor: package-set
    version: '*'
  almalinux-*-universal-x86_64:
    distri: almalinux
    flavor: universal
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    almalinux-*-boot-iso-x86_64:
    - install_default:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 11
    almalinux-*-dvd-iso-x86_64:
    - anaconda_help:
        priority: 20
    - base_reboot_unmount:
        priority: 20
    - base_system_logging:
        priority: 20
    - base_update_cli:
        priority: 20
    - base_package_install_remove:
        priority: 40
    - base_services_start:
        priority: 40
    - base_selinux:
        priority: 40
    - base_service_manipulation:
        priority: 40
    - install_resize_lvm:
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_lvm_ext4:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_lvm_ext4:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_custom_gui_standard_partition_ext4:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_standard_partition_ext4:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 11
    - install_default_upload:
        priority: 10
    - install_lvm_ext4:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_lvm_ext4:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_standard_partition_ext4:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_standard_partition_ext4:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - modularity_tests:
        priority: 30
    - release_identification:
        priority: 40
    - server_cockpit_basic:
        priority: 30
    - server_cockpit_default:
        priority: 20
    - server_cockpit_updates:
        priority: 30
    - server_filesystem_default:
        priority: 20
    - server_firewall_default:
        priority: 20
    almalinux-*-minimal-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal_upload:
        priority: 10
    almalinux-*-package-set-x86_64:
    - install_package_set_minimal:
        priority: 30
    - install_package_set_server:
        priority: 30
    - install_package_set_graphical-server:
        priority: 30
    - install_package_set_workstation:
        priority: 30
    - install_package_set_virtualization-host:
        priority: 30
    almalinux-*-universal-x86_64:
    - install_anaconda_text:
        priority: 20
    - install_arabic_language:
        priority: 40
    - install_asian_language:
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_software_raid:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_software_raid:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_custom_gui_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_custom_gui_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_cyrillic_language:
        priority: 40
    - install_delete_partial:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_delete_partial:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_delete_pata:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_delete_pata:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 21
    - install_european_language:
        priority: 40
    - install_lvmthin:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - install_lvmthin:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_mirrorlist_graphical:
        priority: 20
    - install_multi:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_multi:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 21
    - install_multi_empty:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_multi_empty:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_with_swap:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_with_swap:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 51
    - install_pxeboot:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_pxeboot:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_repository_http_graphical:
        priority: 20
    - install_repository_http_variation:
        priority: 20
    - install_rescue_encrypted:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 31
    - install_rescue_encrypted:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 32
    - install_sata:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_sata:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 21
    - install_scsi_updates_img:
        priority: 20
    - install_serial_console:
        priority: 30
    - install_shrink_ext4:
        priority: 40
    - install_shrink_ntfs:
        priority: 40
    - install_simple_encrypted:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_simple_encrypted:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_simple_free_space:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_simple_free_space:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_software_raid:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 31
    - install_software_raid:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 30
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 41
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 40
    - memtest:
        priority: 30
